channel.title: System of a Down
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i38.photobucket.com/albums/e142/Hannahsbf/systemofa1.gif[/img]
[b]Do you like System of a Down?[/b]
If your a SOAD fan post here!
Post your favorite songs here also!
[i]My Personal Favorites[/i]
Mezmerize - B.Y.O.B., Cigaro, Question!, Revenga
Hypnotize - Hypnotize, Attack, Dreaming, Kill Rock n' Roll
Steal This Album - Bubbles, F*** the System, I-E-A-I-A-I-O, Boom!
Toxicity - Psycho, Chop Suey, Aerials, Toxicity
System of a Down (its there first CD) - Suite-Pee, Know, P.L.U.C.K., Know, Sugar, Spiders, Mind
For some more information go to ..
[url=http://www.systemofadown.com]www.systemofadown.com[/url] or .. [url=http://www.myspace.com/soad]www.myspace.com/soad[/url]
[b]Band Members[/b]
[IMG]http://i38.photobucket.com/albums/e142/Hannahsbf/systempress1.jpg[/img] John Daron Serj Shavo Dolmayan Malakian Tankian Odadjian Drums Guitar Vocals Bass
[b]Songs on the albums[/b] [i]From oldest to newest[/i]
[b]System of a Down's Albums[/b]
Cd 1# - System of a Down
System of a Down - DDevil System of a Down - CUBert System of a Down - Suitepee System of a Down - Know System of a Down - Darts System of a Down - Soil System of a Down - War? System of a Down - Mind System of a Down - Spiders System of a Down - Sugar System of a Down - Peephole System of a Down - Suggestions System of a Down - P.L.U.C.K.
Cd 2# - Toxicity
Toxicity - Prison Song Toxicity - X Toxicity - ATWA Toxicity - Psycho Toxicity - Needles Toxicity - Chop Suey! Toxicity - Science Toxicity - Aerials Toxicity - Deer Dance Toxicity - Bounce Toxicity - Shimmy Toxicity - Jet Pilot Toxicity - Forest Toxicity - Toxicity
Cd 3# - Steal This Album!
Steal This Album - Chick 'N Stu Steal This Album - N'UNS Steal This Album - 36 Steal This Album - Ego Brain Steal This Album - Innervision Steal This Album - A.D.D. Steal This Album - Pictures Steal This Album - Thetawaves Steal This Album - Bubbles Steal This Album - Mr.Jack Steal This Album - Highway Song Steal This Album - Roulette Steal This Album - Boom! Steal This Album - I-E-A-I-A-I-O Steal This Album - F*** The System Steal This Album - Streamline
Cd #4 - Hypnotize
Hypnotize - Attack Hypnotize - Stealing Sociaty Hypnotize - Vicinity of Obscenity Hypnotize - Dreaming Hypnotize - Tentative Hypnotize - She's Like Heroin Hypnotize - Kill Rock N Roll Hypnotize - U-Fig Hypnotize - Lonely Day Hypnotize - Hypnotize Hypnotize - Holy Mountains Hypnotize - Soldier Side
Cd 5# - Mezmerize
Mezmerize - Soldier Side - Intro Mezmerize - Radio/Video Mezmerize - Sad Statue Mezmerize - B.Y.O.B. Mezmerize - This Cocaine Makes Me Feel Like I'm On This Song Mezmerize - Old School Hollywood Mezmerize - Revenga Mezmerize - Violent Pornagraphy Mezmerize - Lost in Hollywood Mezmerize - Cigaro Mezmerize - Question!
Sadly The Band System of a Down doesn't tour or do concerts anymore. Though Serj Tenkian is going solo. The Band did not split up, as I said they just stopped touring and doing concerts.
Lyrics for the song "B.Y.O.B." (Edited)
Why do they always send the poor
Barbarisms by Barbaras With pointed heels Victorious victories kneel For brand new spankin' deals
Marching forward hypocritic and Hypnotic computers You depend on our protection Yet you feed us lies from the tablecloth
Everybody's going to the party have a real good time Dancing in the desert blowing up the sunshine
Kneeling roses disappearing into Moses' dry mouth Breaking into Fort Knox stealing Our intentions
Hangers sitting dripped in oil Crying freedom Handed to obsoletion Still you feed us lies from the tablecloth
Everybody's going to the party have a real good time Dancing in the desert blowing up the sunshine
Everybody's going to the party have a real good time Dancing in the desert blowing up the sunshine
Blast off It's party time And we don't live in a fascist nation
Blast off It's party time And where the f*** are you?
Where the f*** are you? Where the f*** are you?
Why don't presidents fight the war? Why do they always send the poor?
Why don't presidents fight the war? Why do they always send the poor?
Why do they always send the poor? Why do they always send the poor? Why do they always send the poor?
Kneeling roses disappearing into Moses' dry mouth Breaking into Fort Knox stealing Our intentions
Hangers sitting dripped in oil Crying freedom Handed to obsoletion, Still you feed us lies from the tablecloth
Everybody's going to the party have a real good time Dancing in the desert blowing up the sunshine
Everybody's going to the party have a real good time Dancing in the desert blowing up the sun
Where the f*** are you? Where the f*** are you?
Why don't presidents fight the war? Why do they always send the poor?
Why don't presidents fight the war? Why do they always send the poor?
Why do they always send the poor? Why do they always send the poor? They always send the poor They always send the poor
[b]YOU A SOAD FAN? POST HERE![/b]
Thanks,
ß Boring ß

item.title: System of a Down
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Well, soad is a great band, and was my favorite band until i experienced real music.

The truth is, its a great band for people who just listen to music. If you feel and understand music, system of a down is OK.
